settings.text:
The "Black College Bookstore" was created for black college students and for "Black America" to unite and support HBCUs and look good I have been working in the fashion industry for ten years and on various brands as a product developer, and I wanted to create and develop something that gives back to my community. . I came up with this idea while looking for vintage black college tees to purchase, and I could barely find any. Most of the college apparel you buy comes from the bookstore when you're in school. These are very generic and plain, so I wanted to create a fresh look on that and put out quality fashionable garments that you can be proud to wear anywhere and support black colleges! I am hopeful that creating this space will bring more attention to the HBCUs and possibly push more of our black youth in that direction.

A portion of our profits is donated to the United Negro College Fund to help build a better generation for the future.

Motto: "If you want to go quickly, go alone. If you want to go far, go together."
